events.message: We have successfully received your application for the Software Engineer position. Thank you for applying and we will review your details shortly.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering department as it involves software development skills matched with our requirements.
A recruiter from the Engineering team has been assigned to your application and will be contacting you soon to schedule the next steps.
Initial screening call was completed and the interviewer was impressed with your knowledge of software engineering principles and problem-solving approach.
Thank you for confirming your availability for the upcoming technical interview. We appreciate your prompt response and enthusiasm for the role.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 20th at 2 PM UTC. Please prepare for coding challenges and system design questions.
You have completed the technical interview successfully. The panel appreciated your clear explanations and coding skills during the session.
The HR interview has been scheduled for May 25th at 3 PM UTC. This session will focus on cultural fit and compensation discussion.
The HR interview went well with positive feedback on your communication skills and alignment with company values.
An offer has been proposed based on your experience and interview performance. Please review the details and let us know your decision.
We have received your positive feedback and your acceptance of the offer. Welcome aboard! The onboarding process will start shortly.
You have officially accepted the job offer. Congratulations on joining our Engineering team. We look forward to working with you.
Your onboarding process has started with account creation and orientation scheduling. We are excited to have you onboard as a Software Engineer.
The hiring process is now complete. You are formally onboarded and ready to begin your role as a Software Engineer with our company.
